original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: Switzerland offers immunity to Vladimir Putin for potential Ukraine peace talks, defying an International Criminal Court warrant. The Swiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis stated that under certain circumstances, Putin would be allowed to attend peace talks in Switzerland without fear of arrest. The possibility of a peace summit in Switzerland was also raised by French President Emmanuel Macron. The US plan to build a fleet of naval drones to counter China is reportedly facing technical issues and management turmoil, according to Reuters.</s>
